filesystem._comment: Provides Claude Code with read/write access to your project directory. Replace /path/to/your/project with your actual project root. This server enables file creation, editing, and directory navigation within the specified path.

git._comment: Provides Claude Code with Git operations: status, diff, log, commit, branch management. Replace /path/to/your/project with your repository root. Requires Python and uvx installed.

postgres._comment: Connects Claude Code to a PostgreSQL database for schema inspection and query execution. Replace the connection string with your database credentials. For MySQL projects, use the MySQL MCP server instead.

mysql._comment: Connects Claude Code to a MySQL database. Replace environment variables with your local database credentials. Never use production credentials here.

docker._comment: Provides Claude Code with Docker operations: list containers, inspect, logs, manage images. Requires Docker to be running on the host machine.

brave-search._comment: Enables Claude Code to search the web for documentation, error messages, and library information. Requires a Brave Search API key (free tier available at https://brave.com/search/api/).

memory._comment: Provides Claude Code with persistent memory across sessions. Useful for remembering project context, decisions made, and architectural choices between conversations.
